data.text:
@JapersRink Is it not easier to ease the minutes of his partner (Teflon 74) by swapping him off the PP1 unit with #2?
2>74 on the PP and it will give him a break so he can play better for the minutes he has (he is also slipping on your graph!)
@JapersRink His play in his own zone has been an issue the entire season.  But everyone has glossed over it or didnâ€™t notice including the Caps announcers.
@JapersRink Looking for that Kempny 2.0 to finish the puzzle on D

And, just to clarify, Fehervary has had a very encouraging rookie year, a bright future, and has been gritty as hell playing the minutes he has. He just needs some help now, and the Caps can ease his workload to his and the team's benefit.
